text: Saint Andrew is one of the twelve apostles of Jesus and the patron saint of Scotland, Romania, Ukraine and several other countries. He was crucified on a cross that was turned sideways to look like an "X". The Saint Andrew's flag is the official flag of Scotland. On St Andrew's Day, many people in Scotland wear a thistle. ==Related pages== *Twelve Apostles *The Cross of St. Andrew ==References== Category:Early Christian saints Category:Twelve Apostles Category:1st-century births Category:1st-century deaths
